titleStmt.title: Dr. Sherlock's Two knights of Brainford brought upon the stage in a congratulatory letter to Mr. Johnson : occasioned by the doctor's vindication of himself in taking the oath of allegiance to Their Majesties after the time, indulg'd by the law, was expired.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
